_comment: Created by NCODowd on 14/09/2016 15:41:01 using v2.7
title: Would patients recommend their GP surgery to someone who has just moved to the local area?
analysis_commentary:
A similarly high percentage would recommend their GP surgery to someone who has just moved to the local area. This was 82% in 2011/2012 but decreased to 78% in 2015/16.

Updated August 2016.
